name: Youtube Downloader for Android
short_description: Youtube Downloader for Android Phones is the best app to download videos online from Internet to your Android phone. You can download and save videos in different formats as FLV, MP4, 3GP, MOV, WMV, MKV, etc. You have to search bar in this software to search video once found simply click on download button. It's Simple Features - Download videos in parallel parts to increase and accelerate the download speed - Support for large file videos (over 2 GB) - Support different formats: MP4, 3GP, FLV, MOV, WMV, MKV, etc. - Run in background - Several videos may be downloaded simultaneously or in queue Tags: youtube downloader,Android video downlaoder ,mp3 downloader,mp4 downloader,HD video downloader
summary: Youtube Downloader for Android is the best app to download videos
